name: ShootBoy (FonkinS)
description:
This is ShootBoy.
(Yes I'm unbelievably good at naming things I know)

ShootBoy is a 2D endless runner type game, where you must protect the realm by running through it and killing the monsters that have invaded it in 30 seconds

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Shoot in that direction
A - Move left
D - Move right
SPACEBAR - Jump

To defeat a monster you can either shoot it or jump on its head.

Known Bugs:

First of all in the games CONTROL screen, it says you use S to move left, when its obviously D.

If you suddenly die due to no apparent reason, its probably because your 30 second timer (top-left) ran out. I never had time to make this clear.
